meanings.definition: In a triangular manner or shape.
meanings.sent1: The kite flew triangularly in the sky.
meanings.sent2: She folded the paper triangularly to make a paper airplane.
meanings.sent3: The cat stretched out triangularly on the windowsill.
meanings.sent4: The road curved triangularly around the hill.
meanings.sent5: The stars were arranged triangularly in the night sky.

meanings.sent1: The triangularly shaped sign pointed towards the exit.
meanings.sent2: He drew a triangularly roof on the house in his drawing.
meanings.sent3: The pizza was cut into triangularly slices for sharing.
meanings.sent4: The triangularly garden had three distinct sections.
meanings.sent5: The triangularly piece of cake was the last one left on the plate.

meanings.sent1: The triangularly arrangement of trees provided shade in the park.
meanings.sent2: The triangularly pattern on the quilt caught her eye.
meanings.sent3: The triangularly shadow on the wall looked like a mountain peak.
